name: Deserving Life
description: Deserving Life is a room-scale virtual reality escape game for the HTC Vive and was developed by students in the Media Technology and Design program at the Hagenberg Campus of the University of Applied Sciences Upper Austria. Can you find a way out of your misery?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 Ti Storage: 300 MB available space
